title: How to Change Your Profile Picture on Tumblr

steps.title: Log into Tumblr.
steps.content: Log into Tumblr. Enter your e-mail address and password as Tumblr asks.

steps.title: Go to the dashboard.
steps.content: Go to the dashboard. You will be automatically redirected to the dashboard after you log in. If you are on another Tumblr page, click the Dashboard button in the upper-right corner.

steps.title: Click the Account button.
steps.content: Click the Account button. This button is located in the upper-right corner, left of the blue Make a Post button. After you click the button, a window should drop down.

steps.title: Click Edit appearance.
steps.content: Click Edit appearance . You can find this button at the bottom of the drop-down menu. You will be brought to the "Blog settings" page.

steps.title: Click on your profile picture, in the middle of the screen.
steps.content: Click on your profile picture, in the middle of the screen.

steps.title: Select Choose photo from the menu..
steps.content: Select Choose photo from the menu..

steps.title: Choose a photo from your computer.
steps.content: Choose a photo from your computer. It's best if you crop the picture to a square or circle beforehand, since those are the shapes you can set your profile picture to.

steps.title: Alter the shape of your profile picture if wish to do so.
steps.content: Alter the shape of your profile picture if wish to do so. Just click the circle or square next to "Shape" to select that shape.

steps.title: Click Save to save your changes.
steps.content: Click Save to save your changes. Alternatively, select Cancel to discard any changes you've made.
